weeklyTopNews.title: South Australia records two new coronavirus cases linked to known cluster
weeklyTopNews.summary: The two people were already in quarantine and the parafield cluster has now expanded to 33 people.

weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria officially 'eliminates' COVID-19, after recording 28 straight days without a new infection
weeklyTopNews.summary: Victoria has met the official milestone for 'eliminating' the coronavirus by recoding 28 days without a new infection. Victorians will also now be able to visit Tasmania for the first time in more than 8 months.

weeklyTopNews.title: Coronavirus alerts issued for two SA shopping centres as Black Friday puts authorities on edge
weeklyTopNews.summary: Shoppers attending today's Black Friday's sales have been urged by health authorities to wear masks.

weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria is one day from eliminating coronavirus as Queensland and Tasmania set to reopen borders
weeklyTopNews.summary: Victoria extended its streak to 27 days with zero new coronavirus cases.

weeklyTopNews.title: South Australia confirms new Covid case after announcing hotel quarantine reforms
weeklyTopNews.summary: The new case is a student from Woodville High School. Anyone that attended the school on Monday has been asked to isolate.

weeklyTopNews.title: 'A tiny inconvenience': WA venues to adopt mandatory COVID-19 contact register from next month
weeklyTopNews.summary: A number of West Australian venues will be legally required to keep a register of staff and patrons to assist with contact tracing.

weeklyTopNews.title: Two new coronavirus cases added to Adelaide's Parafield cluster - a couple in hotel quarantine
weeklyTopNews.summary: The two initially were thought to have contracted the virus overseas, but further genetic testing has revealed that they became infected while in isolation at Peppers Hotel.

weeklyTopNews.title: South Australia records one new coronavirus case linked to Adelaide's Parafield cluster
weeklyTopNews.summary: Chief Public Health Officer Nicola Spurrier has revealed the latest case is a member of the extended family group linked to the original Parafield cluster.

weeklyTopNews.title: Relief as SA businesses reopen after three-day lockdown
weeklyTopNews.summary: Tha planned six day lockdown has been eased early as the threat of widespread community transmission diminished. State Premier Steven Marshall express that the state made the right move by containing the outbreak quickly.

weeklyTopNews.title: Larger gatherings allowed and mask rules relaxed in Victoria as premier outlines further easing of restrictions
weeklyTopNews.summary: A number of restrictions in Victoria have been eased with masks no longer required outdoors when social distancing can be maintained.
